FuncDef: This command enables Layer-2-Aware NAT port forwarding action.
CLIs: l2-aware create subscriber <sub-ident-string> ip <ip-address> protocol { tcp | udp } [ port <port> ] lifetime <lifetime> [ outside-ip <ip-address> ] [ outside-port port ] [ nat-policy <policy-name> ]
l2-aware delete subscriber <sub-ident-string> ip <ip-address> protocol { tcp | udp } port <port> [ nat-policy <policy-name> ]
l2-aware modify subscriber <sub-ident-string> ip <ip-address> protocol { tcp | udp } port <port> lifetime <lifetime> [ nat-policy <policy-name> ]
